title: Leftovers at World's End
description: The world has reached a dead end, but some folks still carry a flame of hope. A world changing discovery was made by a trio of eye tweakers and a Mexican bakery owner. They found that before the world had gone totally dysfunctional, an exploratory space mission was sent to Europa in search of life.Now, tens years later, the explorers were returning home to a world in the throes of death. Did the astronauts discover something on Europa that could save the world?
author: Joe Chili
